data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 358 believers living in Balod, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Balod, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Balod, Chhattisgarh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Balod, Chhattisgarh, India. Please, stir the 358 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Balod, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Nagarchi (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Balod, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the 358 believers in Balod to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Balod, Chhattisgarh, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Balod
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Sakaldwipi, Gandia Odisha, Gandia, Arakala, Gandhmali
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Sakaldwipi (481,000), Gandia Odisha (3,500), Gandia (400), Arakala (300), Gandhmali (13,000)
